title: New: ELJAY – Your Love (Feat. Morgan Sulele)
body:
Having built up a substantial Soundcloud following over the past couple of years with his own original tracks alongside remixes of the likes of Bieber and Krept & Konan, London writer and producer **ELJAY** has stepped out with his boldest release yet.

A collaboration with Norwegian poster Morgan Sulele, _Your Love_ is a refreshing take on dance inspired pop music. Check it out below.
